description: An island in the South Blue where Gol D. Roger's lover, Portgas D. Rouge, lived and where Ace was born. The island was the site of a brutal search by the World Government attempting to find and eliminate Roger's child.

keyEvents.title: Baterilla Revealed as Rouge's Home
keyEvents.description: Baterilla is revealed as the island where Portgas D. Rouge lived and held her pregnancy for twenty months to protect Ace from the World Government.
keyEvents.significance: This island is central to Ace's origin story and demonstrates the World Government's ruthlessness.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Birth and Rouge's Death
keyEvents.description: Portgas D. Rouge gives birth to Ace on this island and dies from exhaustion after her twenty-month pregnancy.
keyEvents.significance: The birthplace of one of the series' most important characters and the death site of his mother.

keyEvents.title: The Baterilla Massacre
keyEvents.description: The World Government conducted a brutal search on this island, investigating and killing pregnant women and newborns to find Roger's child.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the World Government's willingness to commit atrocities in the name of eliminating threats.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains inhabited despite the tragic events
